job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-20T17:12:38.000Z", "description": "

Fast growing, stable company with tremendous growth seeking a remote Senior Data Scientist to assist the engineering and data science teams.


Data Scientist Qualifications:

  • We are looking for \"hands-on\" data scientists who worked on Consumer-Packaged Goods (CPG) or Fast-Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG) industry with specific project experience in any of these 4 business areas: product recommendation engine: Cross-Sell/Up-Sell, Customer segmentation, and Assortment planning; pricing elasticity; trade promotion optimization; or supply chain logistics with distribution center
  • 8+ years of IT experience and at least 4 years or more of work experience in data scientist discipline.
  • Deep knowledge of machine learning, statistics, optimization or related field.
  • Experience with R, Python, Matlab is required.
  • Experience building machine learning application in areas like time series forecasting, classification models, clustering models, multivariate regression models etc.
  • Experience in Microsoft Azure Stack in the Cloud with focus on Data Factory, Data Bricks, BLOBs, Data Lake Storage, ML Studio, Azure Analysis Services, Azure Data Warehouse, Power BI etc.
  • Experience working with large data sets and distributed computing tools a plus (Map/Reduce, Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Python, R, Gurobi, MySQL, etc.).
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills along with strong desire to work in cross functional teams.
  • Consumer products experience in an online and/or retail/manufacturing environment is preferred.
  • Possess strong leadership skills and exhibit creative thinking to be able to come up with inventive solutions to solve business challenges.
  • Strong Technical leadership of advanced analytics teams and vendors.
  • Extensive experience collaborating with Enterprise Architects and infrastructure engineers to identify, design, and implement highly complex, end-to-end solutions


Data Scientist Compensation and Benefits:

  • Competitive base salary plus equity potential with tremendous value and growth!
  • Comprehensive health insurance, dental insurance, and life insurance packages
  • Amazing company culture working with enthusiastic and driven team in a highly meritocratic environment
  • Join a leadership team with decades of experience in the artificial intelligence world with a conservative approach to regulation that will position us well for sustainable long-term growth and expansion
